Give.origin: [I the remainder of my estate to my wife]

1 a.definition: to make a gift of [I the remainder of my estate to my wife] compare,

sub_terms.b: to grant or bestow by formal action [the lawcitizens the right to vote]

2 a.definition: to transfer from one's authority or custody [the sheriffthe prisoner to the warden]

sub_terms.b: to execute and deliver [all officers must bond]
sub_terms.c: to communicate or impart to another [failed to adequate notice]
sub_terms.d: to offer or submit for the consideration of another [ testimony in court]

3.definition: to yield possession of by way of exchange [will top dollar for your used car]

sub_terms.b: to award by formal verdict [judgment wasagainst the plaintiff]
